scripts.resetProgressTable: node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/deleteProgressTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/createProgressTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/populateProgressTable.js
scripts.resetDiaryTable: node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/deleteDiaryTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/createDiaryTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/populateDiaryTable.js
scripts.resetAll: node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/deleteProgressTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/deleteDiaryTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/createProgressTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/populateProgressTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/createDiaryTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/populateDiaryTable.js
scripts.resetUsersTable: node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/deleteUsersTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/createUsersTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/populateUsersTable.js
